content.rendered:
World AIDS Day celebration was celebrated on 5 December 2016 from 10.00am to 2.00pm at Thideer Nagar. It was celebrated with an awareness session. More than 153 people gathered for this session. The basic objective of the programme was to create awareness on HIV / AIDS among the target group. The session started with the information on basic health and hygiene and slowly moved to HIV / AIDS. Information on HIV /AIDS, the ways it spreads, the precautions which have to be taken to protect oneself from it and the treatment available for the HIV / AIDS patients in the Government hospitals was covered. The session was very elaborative and each and everything was explained in detail.

The participants were asked to clarify all their doubts and a demo of how to use a condom properly was also conducted.

The participants shared the feedback that it was an eye opening session and they could get more information on HIV/AIDS and conveyed their thanks to Swabhiman team.
